attributes.action: Keep the symbol of Britannia on 50p coins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Removing the image of Britannia is yet another attack upon British Heritage, this national emblem makes our country distinct and the move to remove it may seem small but is deeply symbolic of the current state of affairs. The British are constantly berated for not being as 'vibrant' as other cultures, but its hard to be when the government keeps removing and destroying our old traditions and belittling our history bit by bit. So i urge people to sign to save this small bit of our collective past.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
